RecordThing.Description: 6 out of 10 astronauts say they prefer using our Nutrient Gel rather than being exposed to toxic environments! Stores 100 Nutrients. Can be consumed with a closed space suit helmet. To fabricate it, use the {THING:StructureToolManufactory}. Can be refilled with a {THING:StructureNutrientGelDispenser}.

Made for astronauts. Stores 1500mL of Water. Can be consumed with a closed space suit helmet. To fabricate it, use the {THING:StructureToolManufactory}. Can be refilled with a {THING:StructureSealedWaterDispenser}.

Can refil {THING:ItemSealedWater} by adding it to any of the two slots at the front. Requires Water to work similar to {THING:ItemWaterBottleFiller}. To fabricate it, use the {THING:StructureHydraulicPipeBender}.

Can refil {THING:ItemNutrientGel} by adding it to any of the two slots at the front. Requires Nutrients to work. To fill it with Nutrients add any Food to it through the Input Slot at the front and wait for it to be processed. Can store a maximum of 1000 Nutrients. The machine will generate half of Nutrients of the inserted food. To fabricate it, use the {THING:StructureHydraulicPipeBender}.
